body.p: In the IASB’s view, the model in the 2009 Impairment Exposure Draft most faithfully represents expected credit losses and would determine the carrying amount, interest revenue and impairment gains or losses to be recognised through a single, integrated calculation. Thus, an entity would recognise:

li.p: the initial expected credit losses over the life of the asset through the credit-adjusted effective interest rate; and
any changes in expected credit losses when those changes occurred.
